## Checklist

- [ ] PR title follows the repo convention (e.g., `[Fix]: ...`, `[Feature]: ...`)
- [ ] Changes are scoped and focused
- [ ] Tests added/updated where appropriate
- [ ] Lint/format checks pass (where configured)
- [ ] Documentation updated (if behavior or usage changed)
- [ ] No secrets in code/logs/screenshots
- [ ] For hotfix: targets `production` first, with plan to back-merge to `master`
- [ ] For release: includes release notes/checklist updates as needed
